post:
We sure did take one from BuyVM. Thanks Francisco. :)

ChicagoVPS is offering $12/year OpenVZ plan's now. This isn't a promotion either, we are offering as part of our regular packages.

Spec's include:

128MB RAM
10GB HDD
100GB BW @ 100Mbit
Order Link - Chicago: http://billing.chicagovps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=73
Order Link - Buffalo: http://billing.chicagovps.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=74

Thanks!
